Title: Super Real Mahjong: Mahjong Battle Scramble - Konran-teki Sento Mahjong
Description: ['Sequel of ', Super Real Mahjong, '.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Mahjong-playing sisters Kasumi, Miki, and Shouko are sent to a world where mahjong tiles are currency. In order to return to their world, they must defeat a mahjong-playing rabbit who rules the land.']
